primary.context: Caller received a letter about the new portal but is having trouble with the registration ID and login process.
primary.detail: The agent offered to send a registration link and was confirming the email address when the caller disconnected.

steps: Caller explained difficulty registering for the new Vacatia Clubhouse portal.
Agent performed account lookup and identity verification.
Agent clarified the difference between RCI ID and Vacatia ID.
Agent offered to send a registration link to the email on file.
Caller confirmed the email address but the call ended before the agent could confirm the link was sent.

clarifications.note: Agent asked for last name spelling again.

corrections.note: Customer corrected agent's spelling of last name.

actions.detail: Verified name and state of residence.

insights.summary: The caller was struggling to register for the new portal using an RCI ID instead of a Vacatia ID. The agent successfully verified the account and was in the process of sending a registration link when the call disconnected.
insights.verbatim: I type in the code that I got from the code, and it says it's not no good. Actually, it logged me in. It says we're already we're already members. I'm just trying to set this thing up. It's ridiculous.
insights.coaching: The agent handled the technical confusion well by explaining the difference between IDs. The call was a mid-task abandon, likely due to a connection issue or the caller being satisfied once the email was confirmed.
